duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead requirements elicitation and documentation for the development and maintenance of the Ignite data analytics product.
Collaborate with Product Owner, stakeholders, and development teams to understand business goals and objectives.
Perform analysis of large-scale epics and features, and work closely with Program Leadership and teams for accurate scoping and feasibility assessment.
Lead backlog management and refinement activities assisting in prioritizing and sequencing work items based on business value and technical complexity.
Collaborate within the Scrum team and Program Leadership on progress updates and risk identification during development.
Develop and conduct product presentations and/or demonstrations for various stakeholders and development team members.
Perform as a change agent on identified Agile process improvements for the development team.
Collaborate with the QA Lead to ensure effective coordination and execution of User Acceptance Testing efforts.
Work with the development team to demonstrate work to the Product Manager and ensure compliance with the Definition of Done (DoD).
Collaborate to promptly identify and prioritize issues reported in a production environment to ensure timely resolution and minimize impacts on users.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
